original: 孫權說完，隨即斬下桌子一角，諸葛亮辯倒群儒後，孫權再無顧慮，諸葛亮順利促成孫劉同盟，為日後赤壁之戰揭開序幕。
text: After Sun Quan finished speaking, he immediately cut off a corner of the table. After Zhuge Liang argued against the Confucianists, Sun Quan had no worries anymore. Zhuge Liang successfully promoted the Sun and Liu Alliance and kicked off the future battle of Chibi.
